password.invalid: Password must have a minimum of {{length}} characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character {{chars}}.
password.requireUppercase: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase character.
password.requireLowercase: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase character.
password.requireDigit: Password must contain at least 1 digit.
password.requiredUniqueChars: Password must contain at least one special character: {{chars}}.
password.minLength: Password must be at least {{length}} characters long.
password.confirm: New password and confirmation password are not the same.
